Sam Bowling
posts.cooked: What exactly sure what you mean by “errors” what exact problems are you having? Because at a glance (from what I can tell) I think this should work, although it’s different than what I’ve done.

posts.name: Sam Bowling
posts.cooked:
For most of these, it just looks like your import doesn’t work. Try quick-fixing one of the “cannot be resolved to a type” errors. It should pop up with a fix that will allow you to import.

You also could just need to restart VS Code/your computer, because you shouldn’t be getting most of these errors.

This documentation page explains how to bind commands to buttons; I suggest giving it (and the rest of the commands section) a read if you’re new to command-based. Binding Commands to Triggers — FIRST Robotics Competition documentation
